divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Penwell on my way to Rt 57W on my way to Lopatcong. As I came to a clearing in the woods I saw a huge, dull gray blimp. It appeared to be about five miles from me, over some farm land. I lost sight of it as I entered the woods again. In about 3 to five minutes I was out of the woods and entered Rt 57W. I had a clear view in all directions but could not spot the blimp. I continued on through Washington and made my way, looking in all directions for the blimp, until I came to my destination in Lopatcong. I never saw it again. I keep puzzling over how a blimp could have moved that fast. Did anyone else see it? There were no markings on it. It was most likely a blimp. But I can't explain the speed or the lack of markings. I also don't recall seeing a passenger carrier underneath it. It appeared to be motionless at the time I saw it.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around July 31st 2008
